title: (x) Lula Magazine upright connected script/serif - Kursivschrift {Vincent Le Moign, Rainer}
content:
Hi guys,

My lady friend would like to know what the main typeface is on the site [http://lulamag.com/main.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100806062433/http:/lulamag.com/main.html "http://lulamag.com/main.html")

I've sifted through my own library and can't find anything.

Thanks you type guru's!

Rob
author: takhisos

comments.content: [Kursivschrift stehend](http://web.archive.org/web/20100806062433/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kursivschrift/familytree.html), the logo has gone through some modifications.
